title: Spec: CLI commands and UX
description:
Define global flags, command behaviors, outputs, and examples for the tk CLI.

Acceptance:
- All commands in SPEC covered (init, whoami, create, show, view, list, note(s), update/close/reopen, delete, block/unblock/deps, label/labels, ready/blocked/stats, status, merge-file, rebuild).
- Global flags and output conventions documented.
- Examples include JSON usage.
